Inject medication.sentence: The healthcare provider gathers the necessary supplies for the injection.
Inject medication.subject: The healthcare provider
Inject medication.object: the necessary supplies for the injection
Inject medication.tools: syringe, medication vial, alcohol swab, gloves

Inject medication.sentence: The healthcare provider prepares the medication by drawing the correct dosage into the syringe.
Inject medication.subject: The healthcare provider

Inject medication.sentence: The healthcare provider cleans the injection site on the patient's skin with an alcohol swab.
Inject medication.subject: The healthcare provider
Inject medication.object: the injection site on the patient's skin

Inject medication.sentence: The healthcare provider injects the medication into the patient's muscle or subcutaneous tissue.
Inject medication.subject: The healthcare provider
Inject medication.object: the medication into the patient's muscle or subcutaneous tissue

Inject medication.sentence: The healthcare provider disposes of the used syringe and any other materials in a biohazard container.
Inject medication.subject: The healthcare provider
Inject medication.object: of the used syringe and any other materials
